title: Ansel Adams: photographer
creator_credit: David Myers and Larry Dawson Productions
brief_description: The work and philosophy of Ansel Adams, a gifted musician, writer and teacher as well as photographer, for which he is best known. A professional photographer must have an endless amount of equipment; cameras, lenses, tripods, light meters etc. Adams is seen shooting a beach scene and later in the dark room creating a picture. His work as an industrial photographer is also illustrated. Music played by Ansel Adams. Curator - The George Eastman House.
